plot: Idealistic inventor Jayce attempts to harness magic through science --- despite his mentor's warning. Criminal kingpin Silco tests a powerful substance.

Jayce, a Piltover student, is expelled for arcane research after a near-death experience. Viktor, a disabled scientist, offers to help him continue his forbidden work. In Zaun, Vander faces pressure to fight Piltover, while Vi surrenders herself, and Silco manipulates Deckard into consuming a dangerous substance.—Oscar Serpa
